file.name: EPBDS-10422_discriminator_field.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: InheritanceTree_InheritanceTree
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /webservice/REST/InheritanceTree/InheritanceTree
    variables: { }
paths:
  /method1:
    post:
      summary: Vehicle method1(Vehicle)
      description: "Rules method: org.openl.generated.beans.Vehicle method1(org.openl.generated.beans.Vehicle\
        \ veh)"
      operationId: method1
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Vehicle'
      responses:
        "422":
          description: Custom user errors in rules or validation errors in input parameters
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/JAXRSErrorResponse'
              example:
                message: Some message
                type: USER_ERROR
        "400":
          description: "Invalid request format e.g. missing required field, unparseable\
            \ JSON value, etc."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/JAXRSErrorResponse'
              example:
                message: Cannot parse 'bar' to JSON
                type: BAD_REQUEST
        "500":
          description: "Internal server errors e.g. compilation or parsing errors,\
            \ runtime exceptions, etc."
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/JAXRSErrorResponse'
              example:
                message: Failed to load lazy method.
                type: COMPILATION
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Vehicle'
  /method2:
    get:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                count:
                  type: integer
                  format: int64
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tesla'
components:
  schemas:
    JAXRSErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
          enum:
            - USER_ERROR
            - RULES_RUNTIME
            - COMPILATION
            - SYSTEM
            - BAD_REQUEST
            - VALIDATION
        details:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
    Bus:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: Bus
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Car'
        - type: object
          properties:
            passangerCapacity:
              type: number
              format: double
            vehInfo:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VehicleInfo'
    Car:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: Car
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Vehicle'
        - type: object
          properties:
            wheelDrive:
              type: string
            VIN:
              type: string
    ConceptCar:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: ConceptCar
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SportCar'
        - type: object
          properties:
            description:
              type: string
    ElectronicCar:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: ElectronicCar
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PassangerCar'
        - type: object
          properties:
            Voltage:
              type: number
              format: double
    LoryTrain:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: LoryTrain
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Train'
        - type: object
          properties:
            carryingCapacity:
              type: number
              format: double
    LuxaryCar:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: LuxaryCar
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/SportCar'
        - type: object
          properties:
            nuberInWorld:
              type: number
              format: double
    PassangerCar:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: PassangerCar
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Car'
        - type: object
          properties:
            bodyType:
              type: string
            engine:
              type: string
            vehInfo:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VehicleInfo'
    PassangerTrain:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: PassangerTrain
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Train'
        - type: object
          properties:
            passangerCapacity:
              type: number
              format: double
    SportCar:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: SportCar
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/PassangerCar'
        - type: object
          properties:
            Stage:
              type: string
    Train:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: Train
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Vehicle'
        - type: object
          properties:
            trainLength:
              type: number
              format: double
    Truck:
      type: object
      xml:
        name: Truck
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Car'
        - type: object
          properties:
            carryingCapacity:
              type: number
              format: double
            numberOfGears:
              type: integer
              format: int32
    Vehicle:
      required:
        - '@class'
      type: object
      properties:
        color:
          type: string
        maxSpeed:
          type: number
          format: double
        '@class':
          type: string
      xml:
        name: Vehicle
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
      discriminator:
        propertyName: '@class'
    VehicleInfo:
      type: object
      properties:
        Make:
          type: string
        Price:
          type: number
          format: double
        engine:
          type: string
        transmission:
          type: string
      xml:
        name: VehicleInfo
        namespace: http://beans.generated.openl.org
    Tesla:
      type: object
      properties:
        '@class':
          type: string
        color:
          type: string
